name: Critical Bullet: 7th Target
synopsis: This is a sequel to the game Bounty Hunter Sara: Holy Mountain no Teiou. The stage is Neo Tokyo, a dark futuristic city where crime reigns and where no police force is strong and courageous enough to stop the criminals. This is where Sara Fitzgerald, a freelance bounty hunter, enters the picture. Your goal is to plunge into the crime world of Neo Tokyo and defeat the greatest mafia bosses who are pulling the strings.
